Attribute.AttributeName: [System.AttributeUsage(System.AttributeTargets.Assembly | System.AttributeTargets.Class | System.AttributeTargets.Constructor | System.AttributeTargets.Method | System.AttributeTargets.Struct, AllowMultiple=true, Inherited=false)]

[<System.AttributeUsage(System.AttributeTargets.Assembly | System.AttributeTargets.Class | System.AttributeTargets.Constructor | System.AttributeTargets.Method | System.AttributeTargets.Struct, AllowMultiple=true, Inherited=false)>]

summary.span: 指定权限以访问 Internet 资源。

span.span: Specifies permission to access Internet resources.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 允许你以声明方式指定类可使用的 URI 字符串和正则表达式字符串。 allows you to declaratively specify which URI strings and regular expression strings your class can use. 中指定的安全信息 存储在属性目标的元数据中，后者是应用的类 。The security information specified in the is stored in the metadata of the attribute target, which is the class to which is applied. 系统将在运行时访问此信息。The system accesses this information at run time. 传递给构造函数的将确定允许的 目标。The passed to the constructor determines the allowable targets. 系统使用 方法返回的 来将属性目标的安全信息转换为存储在元数据中的可序列化窗体。The system uses the returned by the method to convert the security information of the attribute target to a serializable form stored in metadata. > [!NOTE] > 仅用于 [声明性安全](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/97e21efd-6e89-4115-90d5-ad239513dad8)。 is used only for [Declarative Security](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/97e21efd-6e89-4115-90d5-ad239513dad8). 对于 [命令性安全](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/15aab1e1-6b7d-41ad-b102-c1ed7bedea27)，请使用相应的 。For [Imperative Security](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/15aab1e1-6b7d-41ad-b102-c1ed7bedea27), use the corresponding . ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何将应用于 方法。The following example demonstrates how to apply to a method. [!code-cpp[WebPermissionAttribute_AcceptConnect#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/WebPermissionAttribute_AcceptConnect/CPP/webpermissionattribute_acceptconnect.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[WebPermissionAttribute_AcceptConnect#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/WebPermissionAttribute_AcceptConnect/CS/webpermissionattribute_acceptconnect.cs#1)] [!code-vb[WebPermissionAttribute_AcceptConnect#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/WebPermissionAttribute_AcceptConnect/VB/webpermissionattribute_acceptconnect.vb#1)]

summary.span: 用指定可在此类上执行的安全操作的值初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with a value that specifies the security actions that can be performed on this class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 传递给此构造函数的值指定可对此类执行的安全操作。The value passed to this constructor specifies the allowable security actions that can be performed on this class. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何将应用于 方法。The following example demonstrates how to apply to a method. [!code-cpp[WebPermissionAttribute_Constructor#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/WebPermissionAttribute_Constructor/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[WebPermissionAttribute_Constructor#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/WebPermissionAttribute_Constructor/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[WebPermissionAttribute_Constructor#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/WebPermissionAttribute_Constructor/VB/source.vb#1)]

member this.Accept : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置当前 接受的 URI 字符串。

span.span: Gets or sets the URI string accepted by the current .

value.span: 一个字符串，包含当前 接受的 URI。

span.span: A string containing the URI accepted by the current .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当应用 于您的类时，此属性指定在您的类中将接受的 URI 字符串。When applying to your class, this property specifies what URI string will be accepted for use within your class. 当安全系统调用时，将应用此权限 。This permission is applied when the security system calls . 此属性为写入一次。This property is write-once. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 指定允许的 字符串。The following example demonstrates how to use to specify an allowable string. [!code-cpp[WebPermissionAttribute_Accept#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/WebPermissionAttribute_Accept/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[WebPermissionAttribute_Accept#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/WebPermissionAttribute_Accept/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[WebPermissionAttribute_Accept#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/WebPermissionAttribute_Accept/VB/source.vb#1)]

exception.span: 当尝试设置该值时， 不为 。

span.span: is not when you attempt to set the value.

exception.span: 如果希望指定多个 Accept URI，请使用附加的特性声明语句。

span.span: If you wish to specify more than one Accept URI, use an additional attribute declaration statement.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.Security.IPermission CreatePermission() cil managed
Public Overrides Function CreatePermission () As IPermission

summary.span: 创建并返回 类的新实例。

span.span: Creates and returns a new instance of the class.
A corresponding to the security declaration.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此 方法由安全系统调用，而不是由应用程序代码调用。The method is called by the security system, not by application code. 描述的安全信息 存储在属性目标的元数据中，后者是应用到的类 。The security information described by is stored in the metadata of the attribute target, which is the class to which is applied. 系统将在运行时访问信息。The system accesses the information at run time. 系统使用返回的 来将属性目标的安全信息转换为存储在元数据中的可序列化窗体。The system uses the returned by to convert the security information of the attribute target to a serializable form stored in metadata.
